website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting coverage and quality sun protection have made this primer a favorite in the beauty community.
pros: Primer provides medium coverage when worn on its own without foundation
Lightweight primer helps smooth and perfect your makeup while keeping it locked in place all day
Matte finish keeps oil at a minimum
cons: Product is only available in a limited range of shades

customer_reviews.title: Good color for me and not heavy or caked feeling
customer_reviews.text: Good color for me and not heavy or caked feeling. The only problem that occurred was when I opened the cap, probably a good inch came running out maybe from being pressurized during the shipping. I share this so you don't end up with it in you hand or other unwanted surface.
customer_reviews.author: creator at heart

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: This Tarte BB cream is my favorite make-up product. I sometimes buy it from the Tarte website or from Ulta or Amazon...whoever has the best deal. It's not super heavy, but has enough coverage to use instead of foundation. IIt goes on smooth and doesn't feel like you're wearing make-up. It's a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: Best primer ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer I have found and I have tried them all. Like literally... all of them. You can also wear this as a light foundation with a little powder & you’re out the door in a flash!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy LouWho

customer_reviews.title: Very oily and did not dry
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before and it was great! This tube contained very oily and dark bb cream. I went to Sephora store to buy a tube to compare and the products are completely different. I am returning the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie

customer_reviews.title: I never want to run out of this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I never want to be without this again! At first I thought it was kind of pricy, but a little goes a long way. I have mild rosacea and one application of this covers it, in a very natural way. When I'm not working, it's all I need to apply and I'm good to go. I ordered four tubes total, because I'm afraid of running out, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Because of skin allergies I am very careful of what I use on my face. Tarte is amazing and never causes me any problems. I love the product, has great coverage and feels good. I'm a confirmed user!
customer_reviews.author: AAchie

customer_reviews.title: OMG  I do love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS product--I am 52 yrs old and this product was a lifesaver- Feels like silk -so light and covers so well. need so little. I only use this over my moisturizer and do not need anything else. I love Tarte in general. MY skin feels and looks good with this produc and it seems to be taking care of my skin.. I get a lot of compliments on my skin now and I tell everyone,, Looks good on hands too,,and ya only need a little --it goes a long way...
customer_reviews.author: Damsel in a dress

customer_reviews.title: Tarte BB Tinted Treatment 12-Hour Primer with Sunscreen - Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte. I wasn't sure what to expect here. I usually buy moisturizing foundation since I am over 50. Well, I put on my facial moisturizer and then this. While it was not moisturizing, it made all of my makeup stay put all day! Also, my complexion looked so pretty and smooth. I had an almost airbrushed look. I really like this. I have not found it to be drying to my skin, either. So that's great. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Provides light to medium coverage which is great in the summer when you don't want to use ...
customer_reviews.text: My go to BB cream for all occasions. Provides light to medium coverage which is great in the summer when you don't want to use a heavier product. But the "12-hour" part is an extreme exaggeration. It really only lasts about 3-5 hours, even when followed up with a setting powder and/or spray.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance of coverage & feeling light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance of coverage while still feeling light. It feels like I’m putting silk on my face - it is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products along this type but this is by far the best. It goes on so smoothly and soft and blends really well. It recommends using a brush-don't. You will get streaks from the bristles (and I have a very good foundation brush.) I use my fingers or a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: multimom

customer_reviews.title: Weightless and great color
customer_reviews.text: Light, matte consistency that blends easily and weightlessly into skin. The color was great for my pale skin that has some sun damage. Should reapply if spending a lot of time outside but this is my go-to for BB creams.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TARTE BB CREAM
customer_reviews.text: The is the best BB cream ever! I don't even need to use foundation most of the time when I wear it, especially in summer. It goes on smooth, has great coverage and feels almost like a silky powder on the skin. I recommend it to everyone! The product came quickly from the seller and was in original packing and sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Normal to Oily Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have normal to oily acne prone skin. As far as covering up it does have build able coverage where my acne scars don't show to much other people say they couldn't tell I had scars. I found it to stay on very well and I so far haven't broke out the last 3 weeks from it. Only use mario badescu rose water spray under it for hydration otherwise I found with a cream or lotion I get real oily. Down side about this product is the selection of colors. I went with a darker shade but use a lighter powder to even it out for me. I got a sample from Sephora before I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Tarte make up is the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so silky and easy to apply. I recommend Tarte products to all women. They are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: deanna munyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best primer I have found yet! It looks and feels natural and does not cause my skin to break out. I would reccomend this to anyone with sensitive skin who's active and wants a natural looking primer.
customer_reviews.author: THalp

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovee this product! I have very sensitive, dry, irritated and even red skin tone. This is the best bb cream I've ever used
customer_reviews.author: michelle dossantos

customer_reviews.title: Best. BB. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Applying this primer feels like magic. It's like I put liquid on my fingers and apply the powder of the gods to my face. It's a primer, but I have no need to apply anything else, b/c the coverage is great. And while I've read reviews mentioning that it may have caused breakouts, I've suffered no increase in breakouts with my sensitive skin! This stuff is so smooth and amazing. I don't know how I lived my life without it!
customer_reviews.author: ShaNova

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price! This is a great primer with.light coverage. It makes your skin smooth and lasts all day! Just perfect Love it😍
customer_reviews.author: L Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was using PurMinerals CC cream, but it was a bit thick and didn't cover as well. So, I thought I would give Tarte a try and I'm so glad I did. I have a few spots of Rosacea and this cream really covers them with no thickness or globs.
customer_reviews.author: Read, Travel, Love

customer_reviews.title: Love the Tarte BB cream...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this the first time when it was being offered on QVC....and absolutely loved the way it went on my skin....It was just like butter so silky and easy to apply....The first time I purchased the shade that was a little bit darker then my skin tone as I am an outdoor lady so was perfect for summer and now purchased a lighter shade to wear during the winter months...Really don't need makeup as it just enough to give you that smooth natural look.... Thank You, D Bennett
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best BB cream I have used so far. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lin

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a fake one. The color and texture is different than from the one that I got a sample from at sephora. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AznPookie

customer_reviews.title: love it! light wear and the finish is great
customer_reviews.text: love it! light wear and the finish is great, I do not need to apply a foundation after. It works as sun protection and foundation for me. I have very sensible skin, and this product does not cause any reaction or irritation. very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Castros

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup . Fast shipping A+
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this for almost 2 years now I will not try others anymore . My absolute favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect for my oily skin. Keeps my make up in place and skin looks smooth. The primer can be used alone without any other powder make up on. I like this product because it doesn't leave my skin caky. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda A.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my skin.
customer_reviews.text: The tint in this product is just right for older skin. It provides just the right amount of coverage but is so light it doesn't accent the wrinkles. It goes on smoothly with a wonderful silk feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Magical!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magical!!!! It's super all natural which is great for the skin, NON GREASY which is perfect because who wants to look like a slime ball? Its extremely light weight feels like air and blends great! Also you only need a little bit because it goes a long way. I will definetly keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful BB cream!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product!! Goes on so smooth and you just have to use a pea drop to cover your whole face. I have oily skin and this doesn't dry my skin out or cause it too be more oily. I had been using smash box BB cream and after using this I'll never go back. This product far exceeds it in coverage, feel, and overall appearance. Excited I found such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have delicate skin and a lot of wrinkles. This product deflects my wrinkles and goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price for the best BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte BB cream and this was the best price ever. Bought two tubes the deal was so good. It has good moisture and provides protection from the sun. Use alone or under another foundation in the winter to protect the skin from drying out in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Treble Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Provides good coverage but doesn't look or feel heavy. They claim it has good ingredients too.
customer_reviews.author: SkiMissAmy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect primer for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love this primer and believe me I've tried many. It evens out skin tone while giving me 30 SPF. I put in on first and then I wait a few minutes before I use my mineral powder. It's a perfect duo!
customer_reviews.author: T. Gormley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This BB cream is better than any foundation I have used. It is light coverage, but build-able if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Munson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I love most tarte products but I especially love this BB cream. It's perfect for summer, lightweight, and has medium coverage. It has a permanent place in my makeup drawer :)
customer_reviews.author: ashley wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Tarte is one of my favorite make up lines.
customer_reviews.author: Sarit

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Feels good on the skin, and a wonderful multi-tasker! Light to medium, buildable coverage with natural ingredients and sun protection. Win win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Jill

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a natural-looking foundation
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a sample from tarte, my favorite natural makeup company, and fell in love with it. I started getting checked out a lot more on the street and in public when I switched to this from my former liquid natural foundation (Gabriel). This just looks less like make-up and more natural. It almost doesn't require powder over it. It does a decent job blocking my very light hyperpigmentation (PIH from former acne), and it hardly feels like anything. Absolutely love it. Tarte is an excellent company and their products can't be beat. Ecobella is not bad either - I use Ecobella concealer.
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: nothing great
customer_reviews.text: It seemed okay but not something I love. Would not buy again. I have oily skin so finding something that works is hard.
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: Great bb cream!
customer_reviews.text: This bb cream is amazing!! I now use it instead of foundation. I apply 2 coats to get medium coverage and I was told my face looks 'flawless and natural' by a coworker. SO light and feels great on my skin. Very happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best BB cream!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and was as expected. Tarte is the best BB Cream, it can be worn alone it as a base for foundation.
customer_reviews.author: 123DB456

customer_reviews.title: This stuff delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I love the texture when I put it on my face any time of the day. It feels light and gives great coverage while using very little on my face and upper neck. It even covers any blemishes, discolorations, and scars from pimples. Also, my face feels moisturized without feeling greasy. This is my go-to daily foundation. So easy to apply with a sponge or fingertips. I will definitely reorder this when I run out. Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: ana schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Tarte and this B&B didn't disappoint. It has nice coverage and seems to protect my skin in the Florida sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: right color
customer_reviews.text: the color was correct, got what i ordered and what was described, but it did delayed in arrival i expected the item within a couple of days and received it two weeks later after i paid for fast shipment. but its ok because i love this product, it arrived and i still paid about 15 dollars less than at ulta. I would totally recommend this product from this seller.. As far as the actual product and brand TARTE it is the best brand for make up you can get for the price. Your face brightness, clarifies, and i use it with the clay full coverage so my pores, blemishes, and dehydrated skin looks flawless. You will love this product.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Opened it couple days ago and I could tell that ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened it couple days ago and I could tell that it was not same as the one I bought from Sephora before. It did not give a silky and smooth coverage.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: really nice but hard to match the color
customer_reviews.text: The makeup is awesome, but the color is difficult to match to my skin. The sales lady at Sephora store had warned me about that. The light is too light for me and the medium is to dark. The colors do not line up with their other makeup lines so it's a little tricky (I'm a Medium in their tinted moisturizer line). I mix the light with a powdered bronzer to get the right color for me. But the product is awesome! Has a nice light feel. Not to heavy but gives decent coverage. It is not gonna cover up major flaws, but nice for a day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: JennRU

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Silky Smooth, sunscreen and tinted color! Great coverage and you don't have to use much so the tube lasts and lasts! Nice finish for the face and you look so natural. It covers imperfections beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Good BB cream
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many BB/CC creams and this is probably in the top three. I bought it in fair, and I still felt like it was a little dark for my skin. Great consistency, sheer, a good product overall, but I'm not sure if it is "the one",
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dawson

customer_reviews.title: really love
customer_reviews.text: My sister is a professional make-up artist, and has told me several times what a waste BB creams are. But after a friend recommended it, I figured I would u of try it. For me, I got it for the sunscreen and tinted primer aspect. I've had bad luck with primers before. But this has been a great primer. And I love the boost of moisture it gives my very dry skin. I'd buy all over again just for how long it extends my make up.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not New!
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised brand new in box. Was not in a box and the seal was gone the cap was full of product!
customer_reviews.author: Beautypro

product_meta.title: Tarte BB Tinted Treatment 12-Hour Primer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen Light 1 oz by Tarte
product_meta.description: Tarte BB Tinted Treatment 12-Hour Primer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen Fair 1 oz Brand New in Box...............................What it is: An innovative B.B. treatment with multiple skincare and makeup benefits in one eco-chic tube. What it does: Indulge your skin with this powerful multitasker that works as a primer, moisturizer, light foundation, antiaging treatment, and sunscreen to give you a youthful-looking glow. Worn alone or as the perfect base for makeup, this 12-hour, age-defying, oil-free primer offers light-to-medium, buildable coverage that helps even skintone and other skin imperfections while diffusing light to minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and pores. The creamy, silky formula goes on smooth and blends easily, leaving you with a natural-looking, flawless finish with a broad-spectrum, chemical-free SPF 30 that offers ideal protection from the sun's harmful UVA/UVB rays.
feature_bullets: Tarte BB Tinted Treatment 12-Hour Primer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen Light 1 oz
